product_name: Castelli Endurance X2 Bike Bibshorts - Men's
long_description: The men's Castelli Endurance X2 Bike Bibshorts make long-distance rides a breeze, thanks to muscle support, a ventilating chamois and redesigned bib straps. Form-fitting, 8-panel, polyester/spandex shorts provide optimum muscle support and feel drier in nearly all conditions. Redesigned bib straps accommodate a wider range of body shapes and are engineered for cyclists whose primary aim on long rides is to burn calories. Progetto X2 AIR chamois features a seamless, stretchy top layer that enables airflow and a multi-density foam layer that puts padding where you need it most. Leg grippers lie flat for comfort. Castelli Endurance X2 Bike Bibshorts feature reflective tabs in back for better visibility in low light.
short_description: The men's Castelli Endurance X2 Bike Bibshorts make long-distance rides a breeze, thanks to muscle support, a ventilating chamois and redesigned bib straps.
